Text: disfrutando mexiconsf Bob Mark and Jorge here is a pretty cute email from Gina regarding the status of her visit to Mexico Ive just sent her your emails so she can send you future updates directly Dave Forwarded by Dave GuzmanAVFDFluorCorp on PM on PM To cc Subject disfrutando mexico hi mi familia im here in mazatlan enjoying the warm beach wheather last night was the carnaval the biggest event in mazatlan but i had a fever so were jus t taking it easywe decided not to feel the pressure of driving to our destination rather we just are playing it safeno stress yesterday we were in culiacan and we spent the whole day with the family they are soooooo nice i contacted Jorge the son of citas brother guillermo he came to meet us for what i thought was just going to be breakfast he and his wife i forget her name and grandson Jorgito the rd drove us around Culiacan to the registro civil where i was looking for moms birth reco rd we were directed to go to navolato which is about a half hour away they had no problem driving us there it was going to take days to have the procces done but since Jorge knows the people there we had it done in hours we got some videos of the navolato including where cito used to work at the sugar refinery and th e street where cito cita Uncle Jorge and mom used to walk we then went to visit Socorro citas sister her husband and her sons Oscar and Carlos Socorro is so sweet and looks a lot like cita inluding the use of a walker due to a problem with her right hip she was so extatic to see me and immediately hugged me and didnt let me go her face was so lit up i th ink it meant a lot to her to have family come and visit even though she hadnt seen me since i was a child she also asked about Beto hows Beto she saidIs he married yet the whole family was very nice and accomidating and we got lots of pictures and video including a greeting from Socorro to Cita and Ramn then we left from there and went to a bay nearby called Altata where we ate the freshest seafood imaginable by the time jorge dropped us of at my car it was already night time where we said our goodbyes and planned to have another reunion in a few months when we can spend more time it was trul y a padrisimo experience to see the area where mom was born and dont worry Bob i didnt leave the pictures behind ill be in contact again soon as we are planning to be in mexico city by friday night or saturday morning to get to the concert Unidos Por La Paz a benefit for peace in Chiapas Calling from here is very expensive so i will try to do more emails well i love you all and i hope you are all doing great love Gina psDAD phone number to reach me in Mexico i love you Get your own FREE personal Netscape Webmail account today at The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

opening daynsf mark fyi opening day for the dodgers is Monday April nd against Milwaukee Its a day game The girls happen to have a four day weekend that week and they are coming down for Karens shower on Saturday so I was planning on booking tickets for us on that day Let me know if you are interested and I will book you a ticket or more if you want extra Field box seats are in the outfields so Ill probably just book those instead of getting scalper tickets dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Statusnsf Mark how about them Lakers There is only one thing I can say or maybe words MEN AGAINST BOYS Didnt they just kick ass They are peaking at just the right time The Dodgers are in first place and the Kings have gone beyond everyones expectations Life is good in Southern California On the down side Ramon got admitted into the hospital over the weekend It started out as a problem with very low blood sugar but then escalated into a weak heart problem with very shallow breathing They have him on a respirator and plan to wean him off of that this morning Cita is all stressed out but thank god that one of her neighbors is spending the night with her Were getting an update today on some tests performed on Ramon so well know alot more Cita is doing fairly well I took her for a four hour heart exam last week and it revealed that her last heart attack caused some arterial damage The doctor said that if she was younger he would perform angioplasty In any case her spirits are remarkably high and is still mentally sharp On another matter I got a call last Friday from Ford Motor Credit regarding your account They left a number and asked if you could call them because they have not been able to reach you The number they left was Apparently you left me as a reference on the application Hope you are doing ok and am looking forward to seeing you in June love ya Dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Re statusnsf hey Mark yes cita had another episode of congestive heart failure Im pretty sure that they just need to increase the dosage of her CHF medicine since it was a fairly mild attack The good thing was that she noticed her condition quickly and actually called herself They also took her off an IV within an hour We hope that shell be out of the hospital by Tuesday but wont know until we talk to the doctor this morning Im leaving to Houston on Tuesday and return on Friday late afternoon So I will not be able to go skiing on Friday For Saturday I tentatively have a golf date scheduled with Cicero and the Richardsons Bob was trying to schedule a few foursomes but will not know until today We call it the Superbowl of Golf but actually turns out to be the Superduffers If you are interested in playing Ill see if he has an opening for another golfer and you can play in my foursome If golf falls through a day in Big Bear sounds good if the ski conditions are good Ill need to drive up and back the same day Karen cannot go because she is recuperating from her lasik eye surgery and cannot do any strenuous exercise for a couple weeks We can check the weather and conditions later in the week If golf and skiing fall through then I might take Karen to a museum on Saturday Shes been wanting to see a special Egyptian tour that is actually in Santa Ana through February You are welcome to join us if interested in Egyptology No real plans for the superbowl other that maybe a gathering at my place and possibly doing the HB k run in the morning along the pier Im not too interested in the game itself but wed be remiss not to have at least a small gathering So plan on that if nothing else comes up I will not have email access during my trip to Houston so leave voicemails instead during the next week see ya Dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Re statusnsf Mark I can wait until Wednesday then payoff the Mervyns and Macys accounts see ya dave on PM To Dave luorcom cc Subject Re status Dave if you are short cash I can send you the check tommorow however I will be down there next Wednesday so I can just give you a check when i get down there if you like The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

statusnsf Hey Mark below is a summary of the costs I paid for Bills funeral and credit card costs Mariachis Price Club Arturo food chair rental Household CC paid in November Household CC paid Dec th Mervyns bill total of January statement Macys bill total of January statement Total Ill go ahead and pay the Mervyns and Macys bill as soon as I receive your check and since I just got their statements Id like to avoid paying them interest as long as you have the cash I have not received a bill from the funeral home nor have I paid them anything I cant remember if you gave them my address or your moms FYI Ive received two voice mails from bill collectors regarding Citos old Broadway credit card I think they are now Bloomingdales I have not replied to their voice mails and do not know how they received my phone number But Ill ignore them for now since they are trying to hunt down Salvador Guzman who died years ago anyway They will probably give up trying to collect but just thought Id let you know about that pending liability Do you know how much Bill owed them In case you dont have my address it is Southwind Circle HB see ya Dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Re plansnsf mark I talked to Jorge last night and we thought wed just hang out at his place or see a movie on Saturday night Steves family is coming over on Sunday for dinner and so is Donald thats all I know Im not sure about skiiing Jorge and Cherie have been snow shoeing lately and that might be fun since it includes them in the activity and I have never done that Donald also snow shoes We can decide Saturday but Im definitely up for an activity see ya dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

plansnsf hey mark how about them beavs I suppose that surpassed even your expectations It was definitely fun to watch them wax ND Karen and I spent New Years in Palm Desert with a few friends that have a home right on the golf course I played a round but did not shoot as well as I did when I played with you Shot a but was still pleased and had fun As I told you last week I will be going to Seattle for business and will be staying with Jorge on Saturday and Sunday nights I arrive at Seatac at pm on Saturday Just wondering if you decided to drive up for the weekend also Let me know either way If not then well catch you in a couple months love ya dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Re entertainment booksnsf mark If you are interested you need to order it and charge online with the details listed Note the reference number shown below dave Dave Guzman PM To cc Subject entertainment books Hey Mark I just got this from Carla in case you are interested She said the cost is but you need to reference the NDB number below NDB is the high school she goes to see ya Sunday dave Forwarded by Dave GuzmanAVFDFluorCorp on PM Carl Alylos on AM To cc Subject entertainment books Hey Dad The entertainment books you can gt online are at entertainmentcom and the NDB number is Im not sure when the dead line is but i think it might be sometime this week Let Aunt Janelle Markie and whoever else wants one that they can get it online Order it as soon as possible because i dont know when the dead line is Love you Carla Get Your Private Free Email from MSN Hotmail at Share information about yourself create your own public profile at The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company

Re Holiday Plansnsf Hey Mark I hesitated in calling you at work but the credit collection agency said that if we didnt commit to pay something today then they would write off the entire amount as a bad debt which would have permanently impacted both of our credit histories Apparently they are only allowed to keep delinquent accounts for six months on their books before writeoff and your last payment was end of March The guy on the phone said that they were calling all of Oregon to get hold of you and even called Washington Mutual and the frat house Someone at the frat house said you may have moved to southern california Then they finally got my house by calling information after calling several other Guzmans in Orange County This will work out as soon as we get current on the account I told them to deduct from my back account and he agreed to postdate the payment in two weeks I also explained the death in our family and he said it will not permanently hurt our credit history other than showing we were late several months There is no need to write a letter and you can pay me when you get the insurance check My girls also fly in for the week on Sunday about pm Plan on coming over for dinner about since well all be there anyway Let me know if you need a ride from the airport Love ya and go beavs Dave The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use review retransmission dissemination distribution reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this message is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of the company
